alien.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: very different from what you are used to, especially in a way that is difficult to understand or accept
alien.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: the alien environment of the city
a way of life that is totally alien to us
alien.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: belonging to another country or race
alien.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: relating to creatures from another world
alien.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: someone who is not a legal citizen of the country they are living or working in
alien.translation[1].definitions[0].note: Alien is used in official contexts. In everyday English, foreigner is used, but can sound disapproving or unfriendly. To avoid this, people often use the expression people from other countries instead:
In those days people from other countries rarely came to Japan.
alien.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: in stories, a creature from another world
alien.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: (1979) a horror film directed by Ridley Scott about a creature that kills people, sometimes after first living in their bodies. There has been a series of Alien films, including Alien Resurrection (1997) and Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem (2007).
alien.translation[3].definitions[0].defi: someone who lives and works in a foreign country
alien.translation[3].definitions[0].exam: measures to preventillegal aliens entering the country
